(:action make
  :parameters (?mixture - mixture ?p - player ?kitchen - location)
  :precondition (and 
    (inventory ?p ?mixture)
    (separate ?mixture)
    (at ?p ?kitchen)
    (heating_element ?kitchen off)
    (counter ?kitchen clean)
    (stove_knob ?kitchen off)
    (not (cooked ?mixture))
  )
  :effect (and
    (not (separate ?mixture))

(:action add
    ; Add an item to a container and update its state
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object ?container - container ?location - place)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?actor ?location) 
        (inventory ?actor ?item) 
        (not (full ?container)) 
        (not (contains ?container ?item))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (not (empty ?container))

(:action heat
  ; Heat an object using a heating device
  :parameters (?entity - object ?device - heating_device ?setting - heat ?agent - person ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (contains ?device ?entity) (ready ?device) (off ?device))
  :effect (and (on ?device) (heating ?entity) (temperature ?entity hot))
